name: Beach of the Dead
description:
Genre

Beach of the Dead” is a 2.5D side-scrolling action game in which you fight zombies on the beach with a hammer in your hand.

Synopsis

Unable to travel due to an unprecedented pandemic, Shin Naka, a travel blogger turned indie game developer, creates a game in which he becomes the main character and travels on the beach. Unfortunately, he is attacked by zombies on the beach…
